text: Bayram Bektaş (born 10 February 1974) is a Turkish football coach and former footballer.2 Yeni Malatyaspor'da Bayram Bektaş dönemi sona erdi‚ 2 July 2016 He is best known for his spell at Turkish side Beşiktaş. Used to play at midfield, Bektaş was able to adapt to attacking midfield or winger positions during his professional career. Bektaş was a part of Beşiktaş. squad winning Süper Lig title in centenary year of the club. ==Career== Following his retirement, Bektaş worked at Bucaspor, Eskişehirspor, Elazığspor, Gaziantepspor between 2010 and 2013, appointed as assistant manager. He served under Bülent Uygun as assistant manager at Eskişehirspor and Gaziantepspor. Duo later joined Qatari side Umm Salal SC in 2014.Umm Salal, Uygun göreve geldikten sonra şaha kalktı‚ futbolarena.com, 29 January 2014 Bektaş began his managerial career with TFF First League side Elazığspor in 2015 and he left after few months. Bektaş joined Büyükşehir Gaziantepspor the same season and finished the TFF First League in 8th position and he left after in the end of season. The following season he return to his first managerial club to Elazığspor in 2016 and finished the season in 10th position. In 2017 Bektaş asked to leave the club, then joined another TFF First League team Ümraniyespor.Ümraniyespor’da Bayram Bektaş dönemi‚ fanatik.com.tr, 8 June 2017 Bektaş immediately aided the team in achieving promotion Playoffs but Ümraniyespor lose two games with score 4–3 and 2–1 and failed promotion to Süper Lig. On 23 May 2017, Bektaş was appointed the Süper Lig side Göztepe for 1+1 years. On 19 December 2018, Bektaş was appointed as the manager of MKE Ankaragücü.Yeni Teknik Direktörümüz Bayram Kadir BEKTAŞ, ankaragucu.org.tr But after less than a month, he parted his ways with the club.MKE Ankaragücü'nde Bayram Bektaş ile yollar ayrıldı, mackolik.com, 14 January 2019 ==Honours== ;Beşiktaş *Süper Lig (1): 2002–03 ;Sarıyer *1. Lig (1): 1995–96 ==Personal life== Due to spending youth years on French side AJ Auxerre, Bektaş is fluent in French language. Bektaş is married with one child. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at TFF Category:1974 births Category:Sportspeople from Trabzon Category:Turkish football managers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Süper Lig players Category:Sarıyer S.K. footballers Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Altay S.K. footballers Category:Beşiktaş J.K. footballers Category:Trabzonspor footballers Category:Konyaspor footballers Category:Kocaelispor footballers Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Elazığspor managers Category:Göztepe managers Category:MKE Ankaragücü managers Category:Kayserispor managers
title: Bayram Bektaş
